qas.question: In nature, this is an essential substance?
What is not a fundamental substance in nature?
Mental phenomena and what else are not identical with material interactions?

plausible_answers.text: matter is the fundamental substance in nature

qas.question: What is the definition of philosophical monism?

context: Materialism is <a0_0>a form of philosophical monism<a0_0/> which holds that <a1_0><b2_0><b4_0>matter<b2_0/><a1_0/> is the fundamental substance in nature<b4_0/>, and that all phenomena, including mental phenomena and <b3_0>consciousness<b3_0/>, are identical with material interactions.
